name: sparkling-aria
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.
